conclusion: Determine how shadows A, B, C, and D change with light source movement
Current shadows are cast to the right of the objects
Current light source is from the front left
New light position is from the back right affecting shadow direction and length
Shadow A is currently to the right of the cake
Shadow A will move to the front left of the cake with new light position
Shadow A size may change based on light angle
Shadow B is currently to the right of the nail
Shadow B will move to the front left of the nail with new light position
Shadow B size will depend on the angle of the light
Shadow C is currently to the right of the first aid kit
Shadow C will move to the front left of the first aid kit with new light position
Shadow C size may change based on light angle
Shadow D is currently to the right of the ring
Shadow D will move to the front left of the ring with new light position
Shadow D size will be affected by the light angle
Final answer: Shadows shift to front left; size depends on light angle
